content: As a result, operating loss for the quarter was $383,000 compared to operating income of $220,000 in the first quarter last year. Net loss for the first quarter totaled $105,000 or $0.01 per diluted share compared to net income of $153,000 or $0.01 per diluted share in the first quarter of 2021. Net cash used in operating activities was $2.3 million in the first quarter compared to net cash provided by operating activities, up $414,000 in the first quarter of last year.
